>
[Cleave](/Feats.aspx?ID=147) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 90 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Trigger**
Your melee Strike kills a creature or knocks it unconscious, and another foe is adjacent to that creature.

</column>

---

You swing clear through one foe and into another. Make a melee Strike against the second foe.

<title level="2">Cleave leads to...</title>
[Great Cleave](/Feats.aspx?ID=159)
